name: Cube Racer 2018
description:
Hello there guys, this is my second in development project.

This time a red cube is geniunly racing on some platforms, trying to avoid hitting black obstacles and complete the levels.

Give direction to the cube with "A" and "D" keys, and avoid all obstacles on the platform, you will not need any other keys or explanations play.

You can basicly jump from jumpers and give directions to your cube in the air.

Complete the levels and give me feed back.

Listen to the cool music , enjoi
